pellets.launcher.documentation: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time

pellets.launcher[:].name.documentation: Name of the launcher (unique within the set of all launchers of the experiment)

pellets.launcher[:].shape.documentation: Initial shape of a pellet at launch

pellets.launcher[:].shape.size.documentation: Size of the pellet in the various dimensions, depending on the shape type. Spherical pellets: size(1) is the radius of the pellet. Cylindrical pellets: size(1) is the radius and size(2) is the height of the cylinder. Rectangular pellets: size(1) is the height, size(2) is the width and size(3) is the length

pellets.launcher[:].shape.type.documentation: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular

pellets.launcher[:].shape.type.index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index.

pellets.launcher[:].species.documentation: Set of atomic species included in the pellet composition

pellets.launcher[:].species[:].label.documentation: String identifying the species (e.g. H, D, T, ...)
